mapper.select: select e.mateid, e.memid, m.memname from mate e, member m where e.memid=#{e.memId jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.MATEID=m.MEMID
select memId from mate where memid=#{memId jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DISTINCT r.memid, r.memname, r.memgrade, e.mateid from member r, mate e where e.mateid=#{e.mateId jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.mateid=r.memid
select memid, memname, memgrade from member where memid=#{memId jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(m.memname) From mate e, member m WHERE e.memid=#{memId} and e.mateid=m.memid

select * from (select A.*,FLOOR((ROWNUM -1)/#{viewCount} +1)page, rownum from (select m.memname, e.mateid, e.memid from mate e, member m where e.memid=#{e.memId jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.mateid=m.memid order by e.memid) A)where page=#{pageNum}
